*[https://galerij.kb.nl/kb.html#/nl/zweder/page/14/zoom/2/lat/-41.90227704096369/lng/-10.72265625 Browse this manuscript] on the website of the KB .*Read [https://www.kb.nl/themas/middeleeuwen/zweder-getijdenboek backgroud information in Dutch] and in [https://www.kb.nl/en/themes/middle-ages/book-of-hours-by-the-master-of-zweder-van-culemborg English]

record.artist: Illuminator(s): [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] (ca. 1415-1440) {{Creator:Master of Zweder van Culemborg‎}}
record.objecthistory: Provenance: Mabel Ward Savage (1884-1956). Probably owned by [[w:en:A._S._W._Rosenbach|A.S.W. Rosenbach]] in the early 1920s. Private collection in the United States. Presented in 1998 by [[w:en:Paul_Fentener_van_Vlissingen|P. Fentener van Vlissingen]] on the occasion of the 200th anniversary of the KB as a 99-year loan
record.title: Book of hours by the [[:w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master of Zweder van Culemborg]] - KB 79 K 2 - folios 012v (left) and 013r (right)
record.GWToolsettitle: Book of hours by the Master of Zweder van Culemborg - KB 79 K 2 - folios 012v (left) and 013r (right)
record.description: Lefthand side folio 012v and righthand side folio 013r from the Book of hours by the [[:w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master of Zweder van Culemborg]] - KB 79K2
record.illuminations: Illuminations on the left folio: *The full-page miniature shows The Annunciation: Gabriel announces Christ's birth to Mary *God the father as bearded old man, usually with crown or tiara or sceptre and/or globe ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11C23 11C23]) *Codex - ll - codex open ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49LL72 49LL72]) *Reading ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49N 49N]) *The annunciation: mary kneeling (+ god the father) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73A523(+11) 73A523(+11)]) Illuminations on the right folio: *The historiated initial shows Bethrothal of Mary *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (h) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(H) 49L12(H)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Marriage of mary and joseph, 'sposalizio': they are married by the high priest ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73A42 73A42])

record.objecthistory: Provenance: Mabel Ward Savage (1884-1956). Probably owned by [[w:en:A._S._W._Rosenbach|A.S.W. Rosenbach]] in the early 1920s. Private collection in the United States. Presented in 1998 by [[w:en:Paul_Fentener_van_Vlissingen|P. Fentener van Vlissingen]] on the occasion of the 200th anniversary of the KB as a 99-year loan
record.title: Book of hours by the [[:w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master of Zweder van Culemborg]] - KB 79 K 2 - folios 027v (left) and 028r (right)
record.GWToolsettitle: Book of hours by the Master of Zweder van Culemborg - KB 79 K 2 - folios 027v (left) and 028r (right)
record.description: Lefthand side folio 027v and righthand side folio 028r from the Book of hours by the [[:w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master of Zweder van Culemborg]] - KB 79K2
record.illuminations: Illuminations on the left folio: *The full-page miniature shows The Nativity: Mary seated, holding the Christ-child; St. Joseph; annunciation of Christ's birth to the shepherds (background) *Annunciation of christ's birth to the shepherds (and/or shepherdesses) at night; a host of singing angels in the air ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73B14 73B14]) *Adoration of the christ-child by the shepherds; mary and joseph present ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73B25 73B25]) *The ox and the ass at the manger ~ christ's birth (+ variant) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73B281(+0) 73B281(+0)]) Illuminations on the right folio: *The historiated initial shows The Nativity: the adoration of the Christ-child by Mary and St. Joseph *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (g) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(G) 49L12(G)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Adoration of the christ-child by mary and joseph ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73B23 73B23])

record.title: Book of hours by the [[:w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master of Zweder van Culemborg]] - KB 79 K 2 - folios 104v (left) and 105r (right)
record.GWToolsettitle: Book of hours by the Master of Zweder van Culemborg - KB 79 K 2 - folios 104v (left) and 105r (right)
record.description: Lefthand side folio 104v and righthand side folio 105r from the Book of hours by the [[:w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master of Zweder van Culemborg]] - KB 79K2
record.illuminations: Illuminations on the left folio: *The full-page miniature shows Madonna: Mary standing on the crescent, holding the Christ-child *Madonna on the crescent of the moon (sometimes called queen of heaven) (in mandorla) (+ angels floating in the air) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11F4132(+31) 11F4132(+31)]) *Angel(s) with other object(s), e.g. weapons ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11G1926 11G1926]) *Angels crowning and/or bringing palm-branches (+ variant) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11G23(+0) 11G23(+0)])
